title: Bloomberg Markets: Blue Apron Slashes IPO Price 34%
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Blue Apron Slashes IPO Price 34%
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Alex Barinka IPO Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing Blue Apron Holdings Inc. reduced the price range for its initial public offering by about a third to $10 to $11 a share as it works to convince investors to buy in to the meal-kit subscription service. Oliver Renick of Bloomberg News also participates in the discussion.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
